script.Text: (The bars are solid. There's no way to break them.) ...Footsteps approach!
The time has come to strike back at Runefaust! I'm letting you out.
Please help me save Alterone! I'll fight alongside you. I can heal too!
Khris Joins the shining force TODO
We can't go this way, they'll spot us for sure.
There's a secret passage. Use it to escape.
I'll get you out of here soon.
